Name: Survival Simulator 生存模拟器
About the game: Survival Simulator is a hardcore survival sandbox game under civilized doomsday. You will control the character to struggle to survive on a perilous and unknown planet. Environment, climate and creatures are threats all the time, but also may be valuable resources that can be exploited, which depends on your skills and ideas. Game Features: * Random world Explore, collect and survive in a randomly generated world to discover islands, caves, supplies, minerals and treasures. * Dynamic Weather System The world has dynamic day and night circulatory system and the climate is changeable. Various bad weather such as blizzard, heavy rain, hot summer, dense fog… * Free Construction Construct buildings and fences to define your sphere of influence, reclaim land or dig for the sea to create your own island home. * Hostile Forces Build defenses, equip armor and weapons, bring medicines and magical potions, and be ready to fight off pirates and various monsters. * Become a Farmer Discover the potential value of more than 20 plants in the game: eat, sell or other magical uses. Enjoy the gifts of nature. * Doomsday Technology Powerful doomsday technology. You can use space-time portal devices to travel fast or transfer materials, or use circuit systems to create a modern living and defense system.
